title: XDA forums are open for the OnePlus 10R, Nord N20, Realme GT Neo 3, and Nubia Red Magic 7 Pro
content:
Earlier this month, we opened up forums for the Nothing Phone 1, Moto Edge Plus (2022), and Redmi Note 11S 4G. Since then, several new phones have hit the shelves, including the Realme GT Neo 3, Nubia RedMagic 7 Pro, OnePlus Nord N20 5G, and OnePlus Ace / OnePlus 10R. We’ve now opened up forums

The post XDA forums are open for the OnePlus 10R, Nord N20, Realme GT Neo 3, and Nubia Red Magic 7 Pro appeared first on XDA.
description: Check out the XDA Forums of the OnePlus 10R / Ace, Realme GT Neo 3, OnePlus Nord N20 5G, and Nubia RedMagic 7 Pro.
